articles.title: Turla hacker group steals antivirus logs to see if its malware was detected - ZDNet
articles.description: Turla, one of Russia's most advanced hacker groups, has created malware that gets its orders from email attachments sent to an arbitrary Gmail inbox.
articles.content:
Security researchers from ESET have discovered new attacks carried out by Turla, one of Russia's most advanced state-sponsored hacking groups.
The new attacks have taken place in January 2020. ESET … [+4110 chars]
